text: George William Bignell (July 18, 1858 – January 16, 1925) was a Major League Baseball player. He played four games for the Milwaukee Brewers of the Union Association in 1884. ==Sources== Category:Major League Baseball catchers Category:Milwaukee Brewers (UA) players Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Baseball players from Massachusetts Category:Duluth Jayhawks players Category:Milwaukee Brewers (minor league) players Category:Bay City (minor league baseball) players Category:Brockton (minor league baseball) players Category:1858 births Category:1925 deaths
title: George Bignell
